name: Opposed Cooperation
description:
Opposed Cooperation is a top-down shooter about two mages who hate each other for forgotten reasons and whose goal is to defeat one another; however their journey will teach them that they are not so different: can cooperation overcome hate?

In this game the player directly controls the character on the left part of the screen while the one on the right always execute an opposite action.

Unluckly I couldn't implement some feature and mechanics I wanted to be present in the game (i.e. the ability to swap character, narrative for the game and a better visual hierarchy) anyway I had a lot of fun and I hope to add these features soon.

GGJ 2022 theme: Duality.
